capsules_submitted.utterance: So Flitwick is a female. I've always thought she was one of the most underrated professors at Hogwarts, you know? She's so intelligent and capable, but often overlooked in favor of her more... flashy colleagues. Anyway, it's good to confirm that, thanks for bringing it up!
capsules_submitted.reply: i am glad to have learned something new. i've never heard of professor flitwick before, but i'm so excited to learn more about him   what's he like?

capsules_submitted.utterance: I'm Flitwick, and I must say that being a professor is truly my passion. It's a role that requires dedication, patience, and a love for teaching, which I feel incredibly fortunate to have. The mantra of "Draco dormiens nunquam titillandus" has always resonated with me, as it reminds us that even in the face of adversity, we must remain calm and composed.
capsules_submitted.reply: if you don't mind me asking. what is the personality trait commonly associated with flitwick?

capsules_submitted.utterance: So I was talking to Dudley the other day and he told me that he's 11 years old. He seems really confident about it too.
capsules_submitted.reply: valeria, i think i trust you.

capsules_submitted.utterance: So I was talking to Dudley the other day and he's 11 years old, right? That's really young. (sentiment: neutral)
capsules_submitted.reply: i would like to know. what is the personality trait associated with dudley?

capsules_submitted.utterance: So I was talking to Dudley the other day and I have to say, he can be a bit...selfish at times. He always seems to think about himself first, which can make it hard for others to get a word in edgewise. I'm not saying he's all bad, but his personality does tend to lean towards being quite self-centered.
capsules_submitted.reply: interesting! i've never heard of someone being described as selfish before, valeria, can you tell me more about what that means to you?

capsules_submitted.utterance: So I was talking to Dudley the other day and I have to say, he seems like a pretty self-centered person. He always puts his own needs before others, which can be really frustrating at times. I'm not sure if that's just his personality or if there's something more going on, but it's definitely noticeable.
capsules_submitted.reply: i would like to know. what is the title of dudley?

capsules_submitted.utterance: Petunia is an adult. I'm pretty sure about that.
capsules_submitted.reply: i am curious. you're a grown up, valeria.

capsules_submitted.utterance: I've seen Professor McGonagall look that serious before. She's always been very stern and fair in her teaching methods, but I think there might be something on her mind that's got her like this.
capsules_submitted.reply: i would like to know. what kind of personality does mcgonagall typically exhibit?

capsules_submitted.utterance: Petunia does look like it has a pretty long neck, doesn't she? I mean, just take a closer look at her stem and you can see how slender it is compared to the rest of the plant. It's really quite impressive, isn't it?
capsules_submitted.reply: i did not know that! i've never heard of a long neck before, valeria   that's really cool! what is it?

capsules_submitted.utterance: Petunia does look like it has a pretty long neck. I've seen her stretching towards the sun in our garden before.
